td.content: s:36 yo white female numerologist presents with 10 months history of severe fever. patient also reports increased frequency of severe chest pain, severe diarrhea, Respiratory. Patient is a moderate drinker she denies smoking o:Height 63 in, Weight 201 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 73, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 16, Sputum culture WBC present with gram positive diplococci, CBC WBC=12000 /mm3,Hgb=14 g/dL, Basic Metabolic Panel BUN=15 mg/dL,creatinine=0.8 mg/dL, rales Bil, mild rhonchi, crackles-LL, CTA-LL, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = diffuse tenderness, BS (+), no hepatosplenomegaly, Skin = decreased tugor a:Pneumonia p:administered amoxicillin-clavulanate - 2 g 2 x day, performed Sputum culture, CBC, Basic Metabolic Panel, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

Value.Value: Sputum culture , CBC , Basic Metabolic Panel ,

td.content: s:female aged 37 ys presents with severe diarrhea, severe chest pain, severe fever and Respiratory. These symptoms are present for about 4 weeks. Denies ever using tobacco she drinks 2 beers per night o:Height 63 in, Weight 205 lbs, Temperature 97.9 F, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16, rales Bil, mild rhonchi, crackles-LL, CTA-LL, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = diffuse tenderness, BS (+), no hepatosplenomegaly, Skin = decreased tugor a:Pneumonia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to pulmonary disease.

td.content: s:a 37 year old white female describes severe chest pain, severe diarrhea, severe fever and Respiratory. denies any smoking describes drinking an average of 12 drinks a week for about 4 years in her past o:Height 64 in, Weight 208 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 18, rales Bil, mild rhonchi, crackles-LL, CTA-LL, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = diffuse tenderness, BS (+), no hepatosplenomegaly, Skin = decreased tugor a:Pneumonia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed clarithromycin - 250 mg 2xday, and ordered Thoracentesis - pleural cavity.
